modern-minimal.name: Modern Minimal
modern-minimal.description: Clean and professional design with cool blue accents. Perfect for corporate apps and tech products. Emphasizes simplicity with a neutral palette and modern aesthetics.

violet-bloom.name: Violet Bloom
violet-bloom.description: Elegant purple and violet tones with soft shadows. Ideal for creative and design-focused applications. Modern and sophisticated aesthetic with refined color transitions.

t3-chat.name: T3 Chat
t3-chat.description: Warm magentas and purples creating a friendly chat interface aesthetic. Perfect for messaging apps and social platforms. Vibrant and engaging user experience.

twitter.name: Twitter
twitter.description: Iconic Twitter aesthetic with bright blue primary color. Minimal and content-focused design. Perfect for social media platforms and information sharing apps.

mocha-mousse.name: Mocha Mousse
mocha-mousse.description: Warm earthy browns and taupes creating a cozy, organic feel. Great for lifestyle and food-related apps. Inviting and sophisticated warmth throughout the interface.

bubblegum.name: Bubblegum
bubblegum.description: Playful pinks and teals with vibrant accent colors. Fun and youthful aesthetic perfect for interactive and creative apps. Bold primary accent for maximum vibrancy.

amethyst-haze.name: Amethyst Haze
amethyst-haze.description: Soft purples and mauves with gentle gradients. Dreamy and calming atmosphere suitable for wellness and lifestyle apps. Promotes relaxation and introspection.

notebook.name: Notebook
notebook.description: Retro handwritten aesthetic with warm beige and grays. Like writing in a physical notebook. Perfect for note-taking and journaling apps. Nostalgic analog feel.

doom-64.name: Doom 64
doom-64.description: Retro gaming aesthetic with bold reds and greens. Nostalgic 90s retro look with sharp contrast and energy. High-impact design for gaming and entertainment.

catppuccin.name: Catppuccin
catppuccin.description: Popular theme with purple accents and soft pastels. Known for its aesthetic and smooth appearance across dev tools and interfaces. Community favorite with perfect balance.

graphite.name: Graphite
graphite.description: Minimalist grayscale theme with muted colors. Professional and neutral. Great for content-heavy applications and serious business use.

perpetuity.name: Perpetuity
perpetuity.description: Teal and cyan inspired theme with tech aesthetic. Modern and futuristic with cool color palette. Perfect for developer tools and technical applications.

kodama-grove.name: Kodama Grove
kodama-grove.description: Natural forest-inspired theme with greens and warm earth tones. Organic and nature-focused aesthetic. Perfect for environmental and wellness applications.

cosmic-night.name: Cosmic Night
cosmic-night.description: Deep purples and blues with a cosmic feel. Mysterious and elegant atmosphere for deep focus apps. Inspires wonder and concentration.

tangerine.name: Tangerine
tangerine.description: Warm orange and coral tones with blue accents. Energetic and friendly aesthetic for modern apps. Uplifting and approachable design language.

quantum-rose.name: Quantum Rose
quantum-rose.description: Vibrant magentas and pinks with gradient effects. Bold and modern for trendy applications. Cutting-edge design with maximum impact.

nature.name: Nature
nature.description: Green-dominated theme with natural brown accents. Eco-friendly and organic aesthetic perfect for sustainability apps. Promotes environmental consciousness.

bold-tech.name: Bold Tech
bold-tech.description: Deep purples and blues with strong contrast. Modern tech aesthetic for developer tools and SaaS apps. Professional and technically advanced appearance.

elegant-luxury.name: Elegant Luxury
elegant-luxury.description: Rich burgundy and gold tones with sophisticated shadows. Premium and luxurious aesthetic for high-end applications. Exudes wealth and refinement.

amber-minimal.name: Amber Minimal
amber-minimal.description: Warm amber and golden tones with clean minimal design. Modern yet warm and inviting. Perfect balance between contemporary and cozy.

supabase.name: Supabase
supabase.description: Green and fresh with bright accents. Official Supabase branding aesthetic. Perfect for database and backend apps. Tech-forward and modern.

claymorphism.name: Claymorphism
claymorphism.description: Soft rounded design with indigo accents and clay-like aesthetics. Modern design trend perfect for UI showcases. Playful yet sophisticated appearance.

clean-slate.name: Clean Slate
clean-slate.description: Simple blue and gray palette. Professional and straightforward design. Good starting point for any project. Versatile and neutral foundation.

midnight-bloom.name: Midnight Bloom
midnight-bloom.description: Deep purples with mysterious elegance. Perfect for applications requiring a moody and introspective atmosphere. Inspires deep thinking and creativity.

candyland.name: Candyland
candyland.description: Bright, playful pastels including pinks, blues and yellows. Fun and whimsical aesthetic for kids or playful apps. Rainbow of happiness and joy.

northern-lights.name: Northern Lights
northern-lights.description: Aurora borealis inspired greens and cyans. Magical and natural aesthetic with cool tones. Enchanting and serene atmosphere.

darkmatter.name: Darkmatter
darkmatter.description: Dark orange and teal theme with modern aesthetics. Perfect for dark mode applications and developer tools. Sleek and sophisticated dark interface.

oceanic.name: Oceanic
oceanic.description: Deep blues and teals inspired by ocean waters. Calming and fluid design aesthetic. Perfect for travel, water-related, or meditation apps.

sunset-glow.name: Sunset Glow
sunset-glow.description: Warm oranges, pinks, and yellows creating a golden hour aesthetic. Romantic and dreamy atmosphere. Perfect for lifestyle and travel applications.

forest-green.name: Forest Green
forest-green.description: Deep forest greens with earthy browns. Natural and grounded aesthetic. Ideal for outdoor, eco, or nature-focused applications.

neon-future.name: Neon Future
neon-future.description: Cyberpunk neon colors with dark background. Futuristic and high-tech aesthetic. Perfect for gaming, tech startups, and cutting-edge applications.

cherry-blossom.name: Cherry Blossom
cherry-blossom.description: Soft pinks and whites with delicate floral accents. Feminine and elegant aesthetic. Perfect for beauty, fashion, and lifestyle brands.

steel-blue.name: Steel Blue
steel-blue.description: Strong steel blue tones with gray accents. Industrial and serious aesthetic. Perfect for engineering, construction, and technical platforms.

lavender-mist.name: Lavender Mist
lavender-mist.description: Soft lavender and light purple tones. Calm and meditative aesthetic. Ideal for wellness, meditation, and relaxation applications.

citrus-burst.name: Citrus Burst
citrus-burst.description: Vibrant oranges, lemons, and limes creating a fresh and energetic aesthetic. Perfect for food, fitness, and health applications.

slate-shadow.name: Slate Shadow
slate-shadow.description: Muted slate grays with deep shadows. Corporate and understated elegance. Perfect for financial and professional services.

ruby-wine.name: Ruby Wine
ruby-wine.description: Deep ruby reds and wine tones. Rich and sophisticated aesthetic. Perfect for premium services, luxury goods, and entertainment.

mint-frost.name: Mint Frost
mint-frost.description: Cool mint greens and icy blues. Refreshing and modern aesthetic. Perfect for tech startups, apps, and innovative platforms.

charcoal-white.name: Charcoal White
charcoal-white.description: High contrast charcoal and white palette. Clean and bold aesthetic. Perfect for maximalist design and strong typography.

silk-rose.name: Silk Rose
silk-rose.description: Delicate rose pinks with soft whites and creams. Luxurious and feminine aesthetic. Perfect for beauty, fashion, and lifestyle brands.

thunder-storm.name: Thunder Storm
thunder-storm.description: Dark grays and electric blues creating a stormy aesthetic. Bold and energetic. Perfect for apps requiring intensity and drama.
